keyMoments.title: Luffy Demonstrates Post-Timeskip Power
keyMoments.description: Luffy showcases his enhanced abilities with Armament Haki against Hody Jones.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew captain's growth and readiness for New World challenges.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Moves to Protect Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Luffy prepares to follow Shirahoshi to protect her from Noah and Vander Decken IX.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Straw Hats' commitment to protecting their friends and allies.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Hody Jones Overwhelmed by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Captain Hody Jones is devastated by Luffy's Armament Haki attacks, showing the vast power difference.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's inadequacy against New World-level opponents.

keyMoments.title: Hody Pursues Noah
keyMoments.description: Despite his injuries, Hody grabs Noah's chains to continue pursuing his enemies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the captain's determination despite being outmatched.

jollyRoger.description: A shark skull with a trident behind it
